context.original_query: Query 1: Open https://www.inkers.ai in a new tab, and click on Demo Button. Inform Decision that whenever it calls any tool, it will immediately return the broswer state, which will have id's for buttons and things it can interact with. So it will have to save them for reuse for next step.

globals.interactive_elements_1A: Error getting interactive elements: BrowserContext.new_page: Target page, context or browser has been closed

perception.result_requirement: Open the website and click the Demo button, then save the browser state.
perception.reasoning: The user wants to interact with a webpage and needs the agent to open the page and click a button. This requires tool use and planning.
perception.local_reasoning: The query requires opening a URL in a browser and then clicking a button.  The agent needs to use a browser tool and remember the browser state.
perception.last_tooluse_summary: Not applicable
perception.solution_summary: Not ready yet.

data.description: Open https://www.inkers.ai in a new tab.

perception.result_requirement: Click on the Demo button on https://www.inkers.ai and store the browser state (including button IDs).
perception.reasoning: The website was opened successfully, but the task of clicking the 'Demo' button and saving the browser state is not yet complete. Further steps are required.
perception.local_reasoning: The tool only opened the webpage. Clicking the button and saving browser state are pending.
perception.last_tooluse_summary: Browser tool (opening URL) succeeded.
perception.solution_summary: Website opened, but Demo button not yet clicked, and browser state not saved.

data.description: Get interactive elements on the page to find the 'Demo' button.

result.interactive_elements_1A: Error getting interactive elements: BrowserContext.new_page: Target page, context or browser has been closed

perception.result_requirement: Open the website, click the Demo button, and save the browser state including button IDs for future interactions.
perception.reasoning: The attempt to get interactive elements failed because the browser context was closed. The agent needs to re-open the browser and get the interactive elements again. Decision should try to re-open Browser and then execute the same step to extract interactive elements.
perception.local_reasoning: The last tool use resulted in an error indicating the browser context was closed. This prevents further interaction with the page. This suggests an issue with browser management by decision.
perception.last_tooluse_summary: Getting interactive elements failed because the browser context was closed.
perception.solution_summary: Website was opened, but failed to retrieve interactive elements due to a closed browser context.

perception.result_requirement: Open the website, click the Demo button, and save the browser state including button IDs.
perception.reasoning: The agent attempted to get interactive elements, but the browser context was closed, causing an error. Decision should re-open the browser before retrying to get the interactive elements. The information is currently not present to summarize. It is also important for the Decision to remember to save the browser state (including button IDs) once it successfully fetches interactive elements.
perception.local_reasoning: The last step failed because the browser context was closed. Reopening the browser is crucial before getting interactive elements.
perception.last_tooluse_summary: Getting interactive elements failed: BrowserContext.new_page: Target page, context or browser has been closed
perception.solution_summary: Failed to get interactive elements because browser context was closed.

data.description: Take a screenshot of the current state.

perception.result_requirement: Open the website, click the Demo button, and save the browser state including button IDs.
perception.reasoning: The agent repeatedly failed to get interactive elements because the browser context keeps closing. Decision should be instructed to re-open browser and retry getting interactive elements but given the repeated failures, it is unlikely to succeed. The information currently available is not sufficient to complete the task.
perception.local_reasoning: The agent failed to retrieve interactive elements because the browser context was closed. Reopening the browser and retrying the retrieval of interactive elements is crucial.
perception.last_tooluse_summary: Getting interactive elements failed: BrowserContext.new_page: Target page, context or browser has been closed
perception.solution_summary: Failed to get interactive elements because browser context was closed.

perception.result_requirement: Open the website, click the Demo button, and save the browser state including button IDs.
perception.reasoning: The agent has repeatedly failed to get interactive elements because the browser context keeps closing. The decision module should re-open the browser and retry getting interactive elements. Since it's failing repeatedly, summarization is premature. It is crucial for decision to correctly manage the browser context so as to proceed further.
perception.local_reasoning: The last step failed to retrieve interactive elements. Decision should re-open the browser before retrying.
perception.last_tooluse_summary: Getting interactive elements failed: BrowserContext.new_page: Target page, context or browser has been closed
perception.solution_summary: Failed to get interactive elements because browser context was closed.

input.original_query: Query 1: Open https://www.inkers.ai in a new tab, and click on Demo Button. Inform Decision that whenever it calls any tool, it will immediately return the broswer state, which will have id's for buttons and things it can interact with. So it will have to save them for reuse for next step.

perception.result_requirement: Open the website, click the Demo button, and save the browser state including button IDs.
perception.reasoning: The agent has repeatedly failed to get interactive elements because the browser context keeps closing. The decision module should re-open the browser and retry getting interactive elements. Since it's failing repeatedly, summarization is premature. It is crucial for decision to correctly manage the browser context so as to proceed further.
perception.local_reasoning: The last step failed to retrieve interactive elements. Decision should re-open the browser before retrying.
perception.last_tooluse_summary: Getting interactive elements failed: BrowserContext.new_page: Target page, context or browser has been closed
perception.solution_summary: Failed to get interactive elements because browser context was closed.
